Desc.entry: A not-for-profit community gym open to members of the public. The gym is equipped with the latest Inclusive Fitness Initiative (IFI) accredited equipment and there is also a small area for warming-up and stretching. Also has a sports hall with equipment for table tennis, badminton, basketball, netball, bowls etc. All members receive a thorough induction and individual programmes can be produced. Membership fees reflect the not-for-profit ethos of the Burton Street Project where the Fit4All is based. Annual concessionary memberships also exist for people with disabilities.
